summary: One day, a skull starts talking to you about renovating a house in Winterhold.  Things get stranger from there.
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading][color=#AA00CC]1[/color][color=#AB04C1]0[/color][color=#AD09B7]0[/color][color=#AF0EAD]%[/color][color=#B013A3] [/color][color=#B21799]M[/color][color=#B41C8E]a[/color][color=#B52184]d[/color][color=#B7267A]g[/color][color=#B92A70]o[/color][color=#BB2F66]d[/color][color=#BC345B] [/color][color=#BE3951]A[/color][color=#C03D47]p[/color][color=#C1423D]p[/color][color=#C34733]r[/color][color=#C54C28]o[/color][color=#C6501E]v[/color][color=#C85514]e[/color][color=#CA5A0A]d[/color][/heading][/center]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/40061-1-1376214641.jpg[/img]
[heading]What is it?[/heading]A short quest that ends with you owning a particularly bipolar cottage in Winterhold.  A skull starts making demands and promising you a house, but not until you jump through a couple of hoops for him first.  Once you\'re done, you can enjoy the amenities, sleep in whichever bed suits your particular brain problems, and try not to have nightmares about the mudcrabs.
[heading]What\'s it got?[/heading]Beds, storage, bookshelves, wood chopping, cabbages, forks, a grinding stone, an enchanting bench, a lovable wolf\'s head, a waterplace with cold flames and water running upward, a dragon chandelier, and a cozy garden of skulls.
[heading]What do other people think?[/heading]
[youtube]KlCvCq_Bpqk[/youtube]
[center]\"It\'s pretty cool.\" - \"An autosave there, which is a little weird.\" - \"Oh my god.  Crap.  What the hell?  Oh, they\'re freaking out!  Okay, okay, okay, okay.\"[/center]
[right][b]-Nozi87[/b][/right]
[center][heading]Take a look![/heading][youtube]ZXV_YKgo4S4[/youtube][/center]
[heading]I need help on the quest![/heading]If you can\'t figure out how to start, watch the video above or highlight this: [color=#313131]Talk to the skull beside the ruined house.[/color]  If you can\'t figure out what to do after that, try reading your journal.  No, you don\'t get quest pointers.
[heading]@#$% MUDCRABS[/heading]Yep, that\'s right.

Also available on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=168781852]the Steam Workshop[/url].
author: Kotep

files.name: Main File
files.changelogHtml:
Script changes to ensure ominous auto-save before entering house for first time
Addition to script to (hopefully) prevent companions being stuck in aggro: mudcrabs deleted when no longer necessary for inflicting terror

files.name: Main File
files.changelogHtml:
Scripting cleanup. Everyone loves setting properties.
Mudcrabs only get cleaned up once you're no longer able to access the unfinished house. Come back again and again!
Small extra detailing done to the front porch.
Weapon rack. Don't try putting forks in it though, it messes it up.
House now orients properly to the map. Compasses rejoice!
Quest objectives should all clear properly.
Learned how to do actual quest item handling. Who knew? (answer: everyone but me)
Added CHOICES AND CONSEQUENCES: choose to pet Scruffy too much and FACE THE CONSEQUENCES

files.name: Main File
files.changelogHtml: Forgot to let you finish the quest. lol oops

files.name: Main File
files.changelogHtml:
Reduced Papyrus errors to a more manageable size.
Removed old scripts in the BSA that may have been causing errors.
